title: Fatigue and SA Degradation
content: Fatigue degrades all three SA levels. Perception narrows, comprehension slows, and projection fails. The worst part: fatigue makes you less aware of how impaired you are. You feel fine until you're not. Recognize fatigue warning signs earlyâ€”difficulty concentrating, irritability, tunnel vision. Take countermeasures before SA collapses.

mcq.question: Which SA level degrades first under fatigue?
mcq.explanation: Projection requires the highest cognitive effort. Under fatigue, we lose the ability to think ahead first, then comprehension suffers, and finally perception narrows.
